manifest.name: Cinemeta
manifest.description: The official addon for movie and series catalogs

manifest.name: OpenSubtitles
manifest.description: The official add-on for subtitles from OpenSubtitles

manifest.name: IMDB Catalogs
manifest.description: IMDB Movie and Series lists. Supports optional settings to use Rating Posters from RPDB.

manifest.name: Rotten Tomatoes
manifest.description: Certified Fresh Movies to Stream at Home and Best TV Shows (2024).

manifest.name: Torrent Catalogs
manifest.description: Provides catalogs for movies/series/anime based on top seeded torrents. Requires Kitsu addon for anime.

manifest.name: Torrentio
manifest.description: Provides torrent streams from scraped torrent providers. Currently supports YTS(+), EZTV(+), RARBG(+), 1337x(+), ThePirateBay(+), KickassTorrents(+), TorrentGalaxy(+), MagnetDL(+), HorribleSubs(+), NyaaSi(+), TokyoTosho(+), AniDex(+), Rutor(+), Rutracker(+), Comando(+), BluDV(+), Torrent9(+), MejorTorrent(+), Wolfmax4k(+), Cinecalidad(+). To configure providers, RealDebrid/Premiumize/AllDebrid/DebridLink/Offcloud/Put.io support and other settings visit https://torrentio.strem.fun
